reviews.text: Stayed here recently as it was the venue for my sister's wedding! Not only is it a wonderful wedding venue but also a great boutique hotel. WE stayed in the Bardola lodge which was nicely decorated and we loved the little lights on the floor. The room was comfortable and nicely decorated with Molton Brown toiletries in the bathroom. The private hot tub topped things off nicely. We saw a couple of the other rooms, which were up in the main manor house and both were nice, the Bora Bora room is absolutely lovely and perfect for a special occasion. The grounds are beautiful, the food was fantastic ( I agree that portions were large but the food was so good that you would have been disappointed with anything less) and the staff were very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: A gem!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would highly recommend this place!
reviews.title: Geat hotel

likes.disliked: — No Ipod docking station, bad bad coffee in the room :-(

reviews.text: My other half booked this for a birthday treat for me. I didn't know where we were going so when we arrived it was a great surprise.
reviews.title: "Wonderful"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Crab Manor is set in a lovely part of North Yorkshire in lovely grounds away from main roads, town centres, etc.
reviews.title: loved it

reviews.text: I believe that Crab Manor has some rooms in the main building but we stayed in one of the wooden lodges away from the main building (only a short walk, around 100 yards).
reviews.title: Never again!

reviews.text: Went as a special treat for wifey's 40th.
reviews.title: Great !

likes.liked: — The Manor and pub setting - fantastic food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tried to get one of the Lodges with a private spa pool but they were all booked :-( However was recommend the Cipriani Palace Room.
reviews.title: Another great stay

reviews.text: We have ate twice in the Crab but this was our first stay at the Manor.
reviews.title: Fanstastic stay

reviews.text: Was is it cheap ??......No
reviews.title: Unique, Perfect Wedding Venue and romantic getaway

likes.liked: — It's unique, stylish with the service and friendly staff to match

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Was is worth it??.......oh yes.
reviews.title: Unique and idyllic...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have been their twice in the past couple of years. The first time was for my boyfriends 21st birthday. I decided to surprise him with a night in The Bora Bora suite. We had a wonderful time, the bathroom is amasing, drank champagne in the room all night and had a wonder ful dinner in the restaurant.
reviews.title: A memorable experience

likes.liked: — It was on of kind & the buildings/rooms are inspiring
likes.disliked: — That I haven't got to see it in Summer!

reviews.text: It's quite a strange place really the restaurant decor can take a little getting used to, but it adds to the feeling that you will never be in a place like it again!
reviews.title: Second visit... wont be the last...

likes.liked: — The Difference - look for the free beer tap !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The 2nd time we went with friends who introduced us to the place. We had a wonderful time and would love to go again, however it's not cheap and can be hard to get the room you really want.
reviews.title: Fantastic night

likes.liked: — The room was fantastic and all the rooms have different themes cant wait to stay in a different room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If there was any problem I would say the reception seems a little crazy. Bearing in mind that I'm the head receptionist of a hotel myself, I tend to notice things more. I wasn't too impressed when the last time we stayed and checked out we stood at reception and spent about 5 mins listening to the girl in front of us slagging off another member of staff to someone else while we where trying to pay her what we owed. Not very professional.
reviews.title: dissapointing wedding night

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I think when you pay over £200.00 a night every little thing that happens counts towards the deciding factor of would you come back and pay the price again.
reviews.title: absolutely fantastic

likes.liked: — the whole experience it was terrific

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: BRILLIANT!! I was lucky enough to get married at Crab Manor. The food was excellant, staff wonderful (especially Damian) and the log cabin was brilliant on our wedding night. The jazz band recommended by the hotel was also brilliant. My husband and our I along with our 45 guests couldn't have asked for more. It was the best day of my life so far!!??
reviews.title: Married at Crab Manor

reviews.text: We had just one night in a log cabin at the Crab Manor. It just wasnt enough I took my boyfriend for his birthday and we both loved it! I haven't got a bad word to say about the place. The hot tub on our own private decking was lovely the room was lovely and the food in the restaurant yes you guessed it lovely.
reviews.title: Loved the Crab Manor
Excellent - but overpriced
reviews.text: It really is a place where you feel like you can get away from it all even if it is for just one night. Would return there tomorrow!

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.text: This place lives up to everything it boasts as offering and I would recommend it to anyone who wants somewhere special to stay or as a treat. The rooms are very well furnished and are very comfortable - perhaps a bit on the small side for a suite - but with the luxury of having your own outdoor hot-tub and an indoor sauna you dont need much else anyway.
The grounds are very well kept and the Restaurant within the Crab and Lobster pub serves superb food from an extensive menu.
reviews.title: Fantastic Crab
